section.title: Dependencies
section.para: Make sure sure you include the correct version of the plug-in in your project. Use the following excerpt (with the correct version) in the dependencyManagement section of your project:

If you are using geomajas-project-server in dependency management, this includes the latest released version of the runtimeconfig plug-in (at the time of publishing of that version). If you want to overwrite the runtimeconfig plug-in version, make sure to include this excerpt before the geomajas-project-server dependency.
You can now include the actual dependency without explicit version.
For using these functionalities in GWT client, see the specific client documentation.
